ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Andrew Andrada is a resident of Parsippany, NJ, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 18 years. Currently he is employed as a Program Validation Manager at Infosys - Daiichi Sankyo Pharmaceutical. Andrew has extensive knowledge of Oracle, Java, Microsoft .NET Technology, ETL, Microsoft C-SHARP, ITIL, ColdFusion, SDLC, Rational ClearQuest, RUP, Rational RequisitePro, JAD, AEGIS, Manual Testing, Citrix Winframe, XML, TSO > TSO ISPF, Scrum Methodology, SAP, Regression Testing, Rational Robot, RUP methodology, ORACLE QA, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Access, Mercury Interactive WinRunner, Mercury Interactive TestDirector, Mercury Interactive LoadRunner, MVS, Jboss, ITIL methodology, IBM Mainframe Hardware, DB2, COBOL 2 MicroFocus, CICS/ESA, Adobe. Andrew has an extensive management experience (12 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Currently since 2013-03 the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Program Validation Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at Infosys - Daiichi Sankyo Pharmaceutical. Since 2011-10 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Quality Assurance Validation Lead/Quality Assurance Consultant at Global Pharmaceutical Research & Development (GPRD). Since 2010-01 for 18 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Quality Assurance Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at Fusion Alliance. Since 2009-10 for 4 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Program Quality Assurance Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at Indecon Solution. Since 2009-02 for 5 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Engagement Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at TEKsystems - American. Since 2008-08 for 10 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Solution Deliver Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at TEKsystems. Since 2008-02 for 7 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Transition Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at TEKsystems. Since 2007-11 for 4 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Engagement Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at TEKsystems. Since 2007-01 for 11 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Quality & Validation Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at TEKsystems. Since 2004-05 for 23 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Software Quality Assurance Manager / Software Quality Assurance Consultant/Quality Assurance Consultant at the Validation Department. Since 1998-06 for 43 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Software Quality Assurance Manager/Quality Assurance Consultant at Micro-Mega Databases, Inc.
